metadata.name: Portrait of the Knight
metadata.description:
Alonso Quijano, Don Quixote, the origin of the knight, the man behind the myth... A portrait that delves into the psychology of the character, the intensity of his personality and the epic of his life adventure.

This complex, dreamlike and traditional illustration (original: graphite on paper, 40x70 cm, digital color with Krita and Photoshop) was created for the book cover of the first volume of the iconic literature masterpiece.

This NFT 1of1 edition is completed with an original and exclusive soundtrack by Cylnea.

The first buyer will receive a Gicl√©e HQ print, signed and dedicated by the author, of this illustration.

* * *

The first epic NFT series about the iconic book of Miguel de Cervantes by the author of the original illustrations for the first ever published version in Asturian Language, Juan Hernaz.

Exclusive and unique collection made of 16 art pieces, 1OF1 edition: 1 min. video showing part of the creation process with original soundtracks by Cylnea.
